/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. 

In the distance, there's a large white building with a curved roof, standing out against the blue sky. The building appears to be under construction, as evidenced by the crane perched on top. This suggests ongoing development in the area.

The highway itself is divided by a concrete barrier, providing a sense of safety and order. On either side of the road, there are street lamps standing tall, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The greenery on the right side of the road adds a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

Overall, the image presents a blend of urban development and natural beauty, capturing a typical day on a highway in Beijing.
